question: Which of the following cities has been chosen as the first city in the country to go smart under the ambitious Smart Cities Mission?
explanation: Ministry of Urban Development (MoUD) has chosen Gandhinagar as the first city in the country to go smart under the ambitious Smart Cities Mission. The city will be provided with Seamless WiFi connectivity, internet protocol-based surveillance, environment sensors, and digital display, speed and face detection, traffic management, automatic number plate recognition, public address system (PAS), citizens’ helpdesk mobile application and a centralised command centre to monitor and control activities on ground.
